I'm a web and big data developer from Spain.

I went to the University of Vigo for a master's degree in computer engineering, then I went to CERN to work in the WLCG.

For some strange reason I like to work with high amounts of data. I'm interested in machine learning, parallel and grid computing.

If you want to get in touch with me you can email me or find me on Twitter, Github or Hacker News
